title: Global A-T Family Data Platform | Activate Account Notification

email.label: Email
email.whoseEmailTooltip: If you are a parent/legal guardian of a child(ren) with A-T, please use your own email address. We will use this address to correspond with you regarding anyone you register in The Global A-T Family Data Platform.

password.label: Password
password.error: at least 8 characters including: a lower-case letter, an upper-case letter, a number, a special character (such as !@#$%^&*).

resetPassword.label: New password
resetPassword.error: at least 8 characters including: a lower-case letter, an upper-case letter, a number, a special character (such as !@#$%^&*).

activateAccount.title: Account Activation
activateAccount.checkEmail: You are almost done! Please check your email:
activateAccount.activateAccount: An email has been sent there with the guidelines to activate your account.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.enterEmail: Please enter your email address and we will send you password reset instructions.

resendInstructions.title: Resend confirmation instructions
resendInstructions.subTitle: If you did not receive your confirmation instructions, you can enter your email address to generate another confirmation email.

login.title: You can log into the Global A-T Family Data Platform using your email address or with your Google account.

signUp.title: Create an Account
signUp.subTitle: You can log into the Platform with your email address by creating a password, or with your Google account. We will use this email address to communicate with you regarding the Global A-T Family Data Platform.

modal.SuccessChangedPassword: Your password has been changed successfully.
modal.YouWillGetInstructions: You will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password in a few minutes.
modal.PasswordResetError: There was an error processing the password reset.
